name: Dead Inspection
description:
Dead Inspection is a FPS where you are confined to a small area and have to defend your house against the waves of Zombies.

Credits:

Doom Assets from: NIGHTMARE - doomworld.com Enjay - forum.zdoom.org John Romero - Twitter Skybox Asset from: Oskar Potatis - twhl.info Doom Font from: dafont.com Sounds by: Mixkit
